products.name: Altra Olympus 5 (Tan) Men's Running Shoes
products.brandedName: Altra Olympus 5 (Tan) Men's Running Shoes
products.description: ; Whether you are running for miles or hitting the trails, the Altra Olympus 5 Sneakers deliver enhanced comfort, flexibility, and breathability that your feet desire. Breathable engineered mesh and synthetic upper. Lace-up closure for a secure fit. Textile lining. Removable cushioned insole. Altra EGO MAX midsole compound is responsive, yet soft for increased energy return. Balanced cushioning platform positions heel and forefoot at an equal distance from the ground. FootShape toe box allows your toes to relax and spread naturally for more comfort and stability during uphill climbs and downhill descents. TrailClaw canted lugs positioned strategically beneath the metatarsals to provide traction at the toe off. GAITERTRAP hook-and-loop tab allows strapless gaiter attachment that prevents debris build-up beneath the shoe. Heel-to-Toe Drop: 0mm Vibram MegaGrip high-performance sticky rubber outsole provides unrivaled grip on wet and dry surfaces, rugged longevity, enhanced ground support. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 11 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.

products.name: Nike Men's Windrunner Woven Lined Pants in Black, Size: XS | DX0653-011
products.brandedName: Nike Men's Windrunner Woven Lined Pants in Black, Size: XS | DX0653-011
products.unbrandedName: Men's Windrunner Woven Lined Pants in Black, Size: XS | DX0653-011
products.description: Since 1978, the Windrunner jacket has been celebrated for its bold simplicity. Now, you can pair this iconic jacket with matching pants for a complete, uniform look. They're made with crisp woven fabric for a smooth feel, and lined with mesh for air-cooled comfort. Benefits:Chevron design lines are inspired by the Windrunner track jacket from 1978, which is defined by its single and deceptively simple design cue. Smooth woven fabric feels crisp and lightweight, plus it's lined with cool mesh for airflow. Soft elastic waistband and cuffs keep them casual and comfortable all day. Zippered hand pockets and back pocket give you secure spots to store your essentials on the go. Product Details:Embroidered Futura logo at left thigh. Body/Lining: 100% polyester. Machine wash. Imported. Style: DX0653; Color: Black/Black/White; Size: XS; Gender: Male; Age Group: Adult | Nike Windrunner Men's Woven Lined Pants in Black, Size: XS | DX0653-011

products.name: Air Retro 1 Low OG Casual Shoes
products.brandedName: Jordan Air Retro 1 Low OG Casual Shoes
products.unbrandedName: Air Retro 1 Low OG Casual Shoes
products.description: How to choose your size. Our sizing buttons list the Men's size first (M) and the equivalent Women's size second (W) Ex. If you usually wear a Women's size 9.5, select the button with M 8.0 / W 9.5. Product Features: Genuine leather materials for a luxurious, long-lasting look. Encapsulated Air-Sole unit in the heel enhances cushioning. Perforations at the toebox supply ventilation. Stitched-down Swoosh logo for unmistakable style. PU foam midsole offers lightweight comfort. Rubber outsole with deep flex grooves for flexible traction. The Air Jordan 1 Low OG is imported. Jump into legendary heritage style with the Air Jordan 1 Low OG Casual Shoes. Boasting premium leather on the upper and tongue with retro hoops style, these iconic kicks remake the classic Air Jordan 1 Low with updated colors and textures for a fresh take on a timeless piece of hoops history. | Air Retro 1 Low OG Casual Shoes
